item.title: Out with the old, in with the new!
item.description:
To whom it may concern,

Hi!

It is been a long time since my last update on my blog. For those who’ve been here before, you may noticed a radical change here. Yes, you are in the right place. Due to the fact that my last generation blog system was built on top of an under-maintained PHP open source CMS platform and hosted with an Arch Linux system which had its package manager database accidentally delete sometime in 2019, I finally decide to discard the whole system and host a new static version of my blog for the sake of simplicity, robustness, availability and reliability. It is also true that I am gradually switching from Chinese content to English content in order to share my articles with a wider audience.
